TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeSystemExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class WindowsRuntimeSystemExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供擴充方法來轉換工作以及 Windows 執行階段非同步動作和作業。

span.span: Provides extension methods for converting between tasks and Windows Runtime asynchronous actions and operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充方法多載可讓您使用.NET從 Windows 執行階段管理非同步作業的物件。The extension method overloads enable you to use a .NET object to manage an asynchronous operation from the Windows Runtime. 方法和方法可讓您將開始的工作傳遞給 Windows 執行階段非同步動作或操作的方法。The method and the method enable you to pass started tasks to methods that take Windows Runtime asynchronous actions and operations. 另請參閱方法類別。See also the methods of the class. 方法會實作時由編譯器作業 ( Visual Basic 中)。The methods are used by compilers to implement the operation ( in Visual Basic).

MemberSignature.Value: public static Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction AsAsyncAction (this System.Threading.Tasks.Task source);
.method public static hidebysig class Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction AsAsyncAction(class System.Threading.Tasks.Task source) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function AsAsyncAction (source As Task) As IAsyncAction
static member AsAsyncAction : System.Threading.Tasks.Task -> Windows.Foundation.IAsyncAction

span.span: The started task.

summary.span: 傳回代表已開始的動作的 Windows 執行階段非同步動作。

span.span: Returns a Windows Runtime asynchronous action that represents a started task.

returns.span: 執行個體，表示啟動的工作。

span.span: A instance that represents the started task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中， C#，您可以在任何物件型別執行個體方法呼叫這個方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 使用執行個體方法語法呼叫這個方法時，請省略第一個參數。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擴充方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或是[擴充方法 (C#程式設計指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 當您想要將工作傳遞至採用非同步動作的 Windows 執行階段方法，請使用這個方法。Use this method when you want to pass a task to a Windows Runtime method that takes an asynchronous action. 類別提供靜態方法 (`Shared`方法在 Visual Basic 中的)，建立並啟動 Windows 執行階段非同步動作代表可以回應取消要求，並報告進度的工作。The class provides static methods (`Shared` methods in Visual Basic) that create and start Windows Runtime asynchronous actions that represent tasks that can respond to cancellation requests and report progress.

span.span: is .
is an unstarted task.

static member AsAsyncOperation : System.Threading.Tasks.Task<'Result> -> Windows.Foundation.IAsyncOperation<'Result>

span.span: The type that returns the result.
The started task.

summary.span: 傳回 Windows 執行階段非同步作業，代表會傳回結果的已開始的工作。

span.span: Returns a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation that represents a started task that returns a result.

returns.span: 執行個體，表示啟動的工作。

span.span: A instance that represents the started task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中， C#，您可以在任何物件型別執行個體方法呼叫這個方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 使用執行個體方法語法呼叫這個方法時，請省略第一個參數。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擴充方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或是[擴充方法 (C#程式設計指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 當您想要傳遞至採用非同步作業的 Windows 執行階段方法會傳回結果的工作時，請使用這個方法。Use this method when you want to pass a task that returns a result to a Windows Runtime method that takes an asynchronous operation. 類別提供靜態方法 (`Shared`方法在 Visual Basic 中的)，建立並啟動 Windows 執行階段非同步作業以代表傳回結果，並可以回應取消要求並報告進度的工作。The class provides static methods (`Shared` methods in Visual Basic) that create and start Windows Runtime asynchronous operations that represent tasks that return results and can respond to cancellation requests and report progress.

span.span: is .
is an unstarted task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中， C#，您可以在任何物件型別執行個體方法呼叫這個方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 使用執行個體方法語法呼叫這個方法時，請省略第一個參數。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擴充方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或是[擴充方法 (C#程式設計指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 使用此方法來取得Windows 執行階段非同步作業的物件。Use this method to get a object for a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation. 物件可以簡化非同步作業的協調。 objects simplify the coordination of asynchronous operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Basic 中， C#，您可以在任何物件型別執行個體方法呼叫這個方法。In Visual Basic and C#, you can call this method as an instance method on any object of type . 使用執行個體方法語法呼叫這個方法時，請省略第一個參數。When you use instance method syntax to call this method, omit the first parameter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擴充方法 (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md)或是[擴充方法 (C#程式設計指南)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md)。For more information, see [Extension Methods (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/procedures/extension-methods.md) or [Extension Methods (C# Programming Guide)](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/classes-and-structs/extension-methods.md). 使用此方法來取得Windows 執行階段非同步作業的物件。Use this method to get a object for a Windows Runtime asynchronous operation. 物件可以簡化非同步作業的協調。 objects simplify the coordination of asynchronous operations. 呼叫這個方法多載就相當於呼叫擴充方法多載，並指定如參數。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the extension method overload and specifying for the parameter. 當您不想要從報告進度的動作取得進度報告，這非常有用。This is useful when you don't want to get progress reports from an action that reports progress.
